Package ch.hslu.livingWithLightColors.BusinessLogic

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CommandQueue
    The CommandQueue collects and stores commands, so that they can be produced and processed asynchronously.
    LightColorsServer
    The LightColorsServer is the central steering part of the application.
    PhilipsBridge
    Manages the connection to the lamp bridge.
    PhilipsBridgeListener
    Listens to bridge messages and state changes.
    PhilipsCommandExecutor
    Executes commands for controlling the light.
    PhilipsLightController
    Controls the lights.
    PhilipsLightGroupListener
    Listens for state changes of light groups.
    RGBToPhilipsHSBConverter
    This class converts RGB values to a PhilipsHSBLightSetting.
    ServerModule
    This class binds interfaces to concrete classes, for dependency injection.
    SifteoMessageInterpreter
    Interprets messages, received from the remote control.
